about_the_game:
Celebrate our Steam launch in style! Expand your unit roster with the specialist beacons or spend the included currency for powerful upgrades.

Items included in this pack:

Specialist Beacons 20

XP Bits                     250,000

Credits                     500,000

Platinum                  500

content_descriptors.notes:
Our game features rich and immersive storytelling, which includes mature themes within the backstories of certain units. These narratives may contain depictions of violence, trauma, and other sensitive topics. Specifically, some character histories explore difficult subjects such as:

Violence: References to physical confrontations and battles are present within the context of the units' past experiences.
Trauma and Psychological Struggles: Characters may have endured various hardships, including the psychological aftermath of war and personal loss.

It is important to note that these mature themes are woven into the fabric of the characters' backgrounds to provide depth and realism to their stories. They are not depicted graphically within the gameplay itself. However, players who may have sensitivities to these topics are advised to consider this information before engaging with the game.

We believe that these elements contribute to a more compelling and nuanced narrative experience, adding layers of complexity to our characters and their journeys.

name: Starborne: Frontiers - Launch Pack
short_description: Kickstart your journey with the Launch pack. Recruit new ships using 20 Specialist Beacons, level them up with Exp Bits, and enjoy 500,000 credits for equipment upgrades. Plus, receive 500 Platinum to spend in the in-game market.
